policies.return_policy: Customers can request a return within 14 days of delivery. Return shipping is free for damaged goods.
policies.shipping_policy: We offer Standard (3-5 days), Express (1-2 days), and International shipping. Tracking is available for all services.
policies.refund_policy: Refunds are issued within 5 business days after inspection of returned items.

faqs.question: How do I track my shipment?
faqs.answer: You can track your shipment using the tracking number provided in your confirmation email at swiftship.com/track.

faqs.question: What should I do if my package is delayed?
faqs.answer: Delays can occur due to weather or customs. If your package is over 3 days late, contact our support team.

faqs.question: How do I change my delivery address?
faqs.answer: Contact support within 12 hours of placing your order to request an address change.

faqs.question: Can I insure my shipment?
faqs.answer: Yes, insurance is available at checkout for an additional fee based on the declared value of the item.

faqs.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
faqs.answer: Orders typically arrive within 3-7 business days, depending on your location and selected shipping method.

faqs.question: What shipping methods do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer standard, expedited, and express shipping options. Shipping carriers include FedEx, UPS, and USPS.

faqs.question: Do you offer express or expedited shipping options?
faqs.answer: Yes, express delivers in 1-2 business days, while expedited takes 2-3 days.

faqs.question: What are your shipping rates?
faqs.answer: Shipping rates vary based on weight, destination, and method. Rates are calculated at checkout.

faqs.question: What’s the difference between standard and expedited shipping?
faqs.answer: Standard takes 5-7 days, expedited typically arrives in 2-3 days.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries.

faqs.question: Are there any shipping restrictions for certain products?
faqs.answer: Yes, some items like batteries, aerosols, or perishables may have restrictions.

faqs.question: Is there a tracking number for my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you’ll receive an email with tracking details.

faqs.question: How do I track my order’s shipping progress?
faqs.answer: Use the tracking number to view real-time updates on the carrier’s website.

faqs.question: Do you offer shipping updates via email or SMS?
faqs.answer: Yes, select your preferred method at checkout.

faqs.question: Can I specify a delivery date or time?
faqs.answer: Currently, scheduled deliveries are not available. Use expedited shipping for faster delivery.

faqs.question: What happens if my package gets lost or damaged?
faqs.answer: Contact support for investigation and possible replacement or refund.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing the order?
faqs.answer: If the order hasn’t shipped yet, contact customer support.

faqs.question: Can I reroute my package?
faqs.answer: Rerouting may be available through the carrier. Contact us immediately.

faqs.question: What happens if I miss the delivery attempt?
faqs.answer: The carrier may redeliver or leave a pickup notice.

faqs.question: Can I combine multiple orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, if they haven’t shipped yet and were placed close together.

faqs.question: Do you provide free shipping?
faqs.answer: Free standard shipping on orders over $50 within the continental U.S.

faqs.question: Do you offer local pickup?
faqs.answer: Yes, at select locations.

faqs.question: Do you offer signature confirmation?
faqs.answer: Yes, available for a fee at checkout.

faqs.question: Is there a same-day dispatch cut-off time?
faqs.answer: Yes, orders before 2 PM local warehouse time qualify.

faqs.question: What should I do if my order is late?
faqs.answer: Check your tracking number and contact support.

faqs.question: Are there delays during holidays or peak seasons?
faqs.answer: Yes, order early during such periods.

faqs.question: What is your return policy for late or damaged items?
faqs.answer: Contact support within 7 days for a full refund or replacement.

escalation.trigger: User asks 2+ questions in a row or types 'talk to human'
